QuestData.Title: In Need of Ingredients
QuestData.Description: Ah, yes. The effects of the Curse cannot ever be fully cured as far as we know.$B$BWith treatment, however, your mind will remain yours... and not that of a wild animal.$B$BWe are fortunate that the treatment worked on you. Normally, I can only treat recent infections.$B$BWe'll need to continue your medication if we're to have you reverse the Curse.$B$BI will need mandrake essence to brew another batch of my serum for you. You will find a crate stashed beneath a shed southwest of town.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Crate of Mandrake Essence.
QuestData.RewardText: The crate has been smashed and the vials inside of it appear to have been broken.
